column4: I need some troubleshooting help, my ethernet is giving me no DNS info and I do not know why
The ethernet used to work fine and then suddenly it can;t resolve anything, yet ifconfig looks fine to my newbie eyes
do you have anything defined in /etc/resolv.conf?
sounds like whatever is serving your dhcp isn't giving you a lease and giving you the dns servers
the wireless gets that data, on the same network
then it could be a netmask config issue
the numbers look right for my network
does the wired interface get a lease?
so that command forced a new dhcp address?
did you get a new IP?
i'll add it to my toolbox, many thanks
